actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO camera_master SET 
area_id = '{{Select1.selectedOptionValue}}',
site_id = '{{Select1Copy1.selectedOptionValue}}',
camera_type = '{{Select3.selectedOptionValue}}', 
manufacturer = '{{Select1Copy.selectedOptionValue}}',
model = '{{Input2.text}}',
resolution = '{{Select5.selectedOptionValue}}',
fps = '{{Select4.selectedOptionValue}}',
ir_enabled = '{{Select6.selectedOptionValue}}',
process_type = '{{Select7.selectedOptionValue}}',
rtsp_url = '{{Input1.text}}',
hcp_id = '{{Input3.text}}',
created_by = {{Text4.text}};
